text: Idea for rebooting blogosphere #2. You know how the index in the back of a book works? Topics, sub-topics, and lists of pages that those topics are discussed. 99 percent of the searches I do on my own blog are really just navigations of this structure. Search engine technology is getting smart enough to recognize not just words but concepts. How about a service that sucked down all the content of my blog and created the back-of-book index of my writing. Realtime. Updated every time I post something or modified a post.
